page.title: 11Clubs and Societies
page.content: {Womens Institute.} weekly meetings - yearly outings - regular speakers. At present numbers are falling and difficulty is found in maintaining the interest in the younger age group. Meetings are held in the Village Hut, Stogumber. {Youth Club. }weekly meetings held in the Village Dance Hall. Games facilities provided, outings and outside activities organised. {British Legion. } Small group of people meet at individuals houses at regular intervals throughout the year. {Church Restoration.} fund raising events of all kinds to replace rotten roof timbers, re slate roof, window settings etc. {Bell Ringing. }weekly Wednesday practice in order to ring for Sunday Services, Festivals, Weddings and Funerals. Competitions also held.
